mapper.select: SELECT * FROM review r left outer join member_info m on r.member_idx = m.idx where VEHICLE_IDX=#{vehicleIdx}
mapper.insert: UPDATE REVIEW SET recommend =#{recommend} WHERE IDX ={idx}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET IDX = #{idx}, vehicleIdx = #{vehicleIdx}, content = #{content} WHERE IDX = #{idx}
mapper.select: SELECT REVIEW.*, REVIEW_IDX FROM REVIEW INNER JOIN REPORT ON REVIEW.IDX = REPORT.REVIEW_IDX WHERE REPORT.IDX = #{idx}
